title: Personal Website
bodyText: This website that you are currently viewing. Created to showcase some of projects i have made over the years of being a software developer.

title: Montezuma
bodyText: 2D Multiplayer 'Beat 'Em Up' for 2-4 players. Made with Unity 3D. Developed by a small group of 1 developers(me), 2 game designers and 1 artist/animator

title: Game Engine
bodyText: Simple 3D game engine built from scratch. Supports 3D models, shader effects, audio, textures, lighting, controller support and basic game mechanics.

title: Your Life
bodyText: 'Your Life' is a 3D mobile game created for a University development challange. The game was created for 'Includem', a youth support charity that helps young people transform their lives.

title: Utility A.I Demo
bodyText: A Unity3D demo that hosts a custom algorithm that implements Utility A.I or 'Utility Theory'. The theory that an A.I agents prefered outcome can be calculated in code to a real number. The higher the number, the more likely the agent will perform the assigned action.

title: DragonFly.js
bodyText: Mobile web game written in pure JavaScript. 'Flappy Bird' style game where the goal is to survive for as long as possible. A simple 2D side scrolling game created for a university coursework challenge.
